title: Early Color TV Shows
description: When color television arrived, it changed everything! How much do you remember about the first shows broadcast in living color?

questions.question: Which network was the first to regularly broadcast shows in color, thanks to its parent company RCA?
Which Western series was one of the first TV programs broadcast entirely in color starting in 1959?
What famous NBC announcement preceded many color broadcasts in the 1960s?
options: 'The following program is brought to you in living color on NBC!'

questions.question: Which colorful animated family debuted in prime time on ABC in 1960?
Which Walt Disney anthology show helped promote color TV in American homes?
options: Walt Disney's Wonderful World of Color

questions.question: What was NBC's iconic color mascot, a bird that spread its colorful tail feathers?
Which 1960s spy series starring Robert Culp and Bill Cosby was shot in exotic color locations worldwide?
By what year did all three major US networks broadcast their entire prime-time schedules in color?
Which fantasy sitcom about a genie benefited greatly from color broadcasting when it debuted in 1965?
Which beloved 1960s sitcom about a magical witch started in black and white before switching to color?
Which science fiction series that debuted in 1966 made spectacular use of color with alien worlds and uniforms?
options: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea

questions.question: The first color TV sets were extremely expensive. Approximately how much did an RCA color set cost in 1954?
Which musical variety show hosted by Perry Como was among the earliest regular color broadcasts?
Which 1960s adventure show set in Africa used its colorful location filming as a major selling point?
Which classic sitcom about a shipwrecked group on a tropical island was filmed in color from its 1964 debut?
options: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
